title: Bug 11866: Wrong labels in Update Test Suite dialog
description: The labels in the Update Test Suite dialog are incorrect.
OB: The label 'TestClasses' is written without a space ('Test Classes to be included'). The status line refers to methods being selected instead of types. The action name is written as 'TestSuite' instead of 'Test Suite'.
EB: The labels in the Update Test Suite dialog should be corrected. 'Test Classes to be included' should be written as 'Test Classes' or 'Classes to be included'. The status line should refer to types instead of methods. The action name should be written as 'Test Suite'.
SR: The labels in the Update Test Suite dialog should be fixed to ensure clarity and consistency. 'TestClasses' should be changed to 'Test Classes' and the status line should be corrected to refer to types. Additionally, the action name should be updated to 'Test Suite' instead of 'TestSuite'.
